column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Upon arriving at our table he gave us a quick rundown
column2: and informed us that *****all of the pizzas take around 45 minutes to cook*****.   I don't think that's a problem
column3: but it is certainly something you want to take into consideration.  We heard other servers ask if their patrons had called ahead
column4: so this is probably a regular practice to avoid the extended cooking time.  We ordered a Malnati Salad
